name: 邱俊智
objective: This course explores the theories and practices of operations management, focusing on integrated production management systems and analyzing industry case studies. Course content includes: Introduction and production forecasting, product and service design, capacity planning, process selection and facility layout, location planning and analysis, integrated planning, material requirements planning, inventory management, production scheduling, and supply chain management.

3	Product and Service Design

5	Process Selection and Facility Layout

7	Aggregate Planning (1)
8	Aggregate Planning (2)
9	Exam (1)

11	Material Requirement Planning and ERP (2)
12	Inventory Management
13	Scheduling
14	Supply Chain Management
15	Digital Twin Introduction

18	Term Projects Presentation
